description: Custom ECL queries for Hemoglobin A1c (LOINC 4548-4)

queries.name: Refined Query V2 (Mass Fraction Property)
queries.description: Uses Component = Glycated hemoglobin-A1c AND Property = Mass fraction (captures HbA1c/Hemoglobin.total ratio measurements in blood). This is the standard approach for HbA1c measurements.
